All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
com.epam.facultative.controller
Containing front-controller Controller and next packages: actions - to call by controller app_context - to create required instances filters - to filter requests listener - to react on events tags - to use on jsp pages constants - to required value with action names, page names, access and attribute names
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions
Containing all required actions to execute by front-controller.
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl
Containing all action implementations.
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl.admin
Containing all admins actions implementations.
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl.general
Containing all general actions implementations.
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl.student
Containing all student actions implementations.
com.epam.facultative.controller.actions.impl.teacher
Containing all student actions implementations.
com.epam.facultative.controller.app_context
Containing all classes to property set up and configure application context.
com.epam.facultative.controller.constants
Package containing constants all required constants: ActionNames - for action names ActionAccess - for access actions for filter Attribute - for parameter req PageAccess - for access pages for filter PageName - for page names
com.epam.facultative.controller.filters
Containing all filters; AuthFilter - to check access for logged user EncodingFilter - to set up encoding LocaleFilter - to set up and change locale
com.epam.facultative.controller.listener
Containing all listeners: ContextListener - to set up all required objects
com.epam.facultative.controller.tags
Containing all tags to use on jsp pages: ShowResult - to return result
com.epam.facultative.model
Containing all model packages: connection - to obtain datasource dao - to work with database entities - base model classes service - contains logic dto - to work with view exception - for correct work exceptions utils - contains most util classes
com.epam.facultative.model.connection
DataSource package.
com.epam.facultative.model.dao
Package containing interfaces to implement Add new implementation as sub package here Implement CategoryDao, CourseDao, StudentDao,TeacherDao and UserDAO.
com.epam.facultative.model.dao.impl_sql
Package containing DAO implementation and constants for MySQL database.
com.epam.facultative.model.dao.impl_sql.—Åonstants
Package containing sql fields and queries for MySQL implementation of database.
com.epam.facultative.model.dto
Package containing DTO classes: CategoryDTO matches Category CourseDTO matches Course UserDTO matches User StudentDTO matches Student TeacherDTO matches Teacher
com.epam.facultative.model.entities
Package containing entities
com.epam.facultative.model.exception
Exceptions package.
com.epam.facultative.model.service
Package containing Services.
com.epam.facultative.model.service.implementation
Package containing concrete Services.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils
Package containing most util packages.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.converter
Package containing util for converts DTO to Entity and vise versa.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.email_sender
Package containing util to send emails.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.hash_password
Package containing util for encode and verify passwords.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.param_builder
Package containing util to obtain string parameter for complex queries.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.pdf_creator
Package containing util to create pdf docs.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.recaptcha
Package containing util implements Google Recaptcha service check.
com.epam.facultative.model.utils.validator
Package containing util to validate fields.
